title: Chummy
description:
## Let's Make the World a Better Place

Any problem can be resolved swiftly, if you involve the right people. We are surrounded by a vast number of kind people who value giving help, and are ready to lend a hand when help is needed.

We believe that there is a hero in each of us. With Chummy you have the easiest tool to change the lives of real people in your city for good.
